title: 装mod之后崩溃
author: homeftw
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-7 21:40 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.

Time: 16-2-7 下午5:13
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraftforge/common/Configuration

replies.author: abeuwrabeuwr
replies.txt_content: 谁发个1.8的合成表和娘化mod并教我怎么用
